name: AVCaptureMetadataInput
desc: A capture input for providing timed metadata to a capture session.

items.name: init(formatDescription: CMMetadataFormatDescription, clock: CMClock)
items.desc: Creates capture metadata input to provide timed groups to a capture session.

items.name: func append(AVTimedMetadataGroup)
items.desc: Provides metadata to the capture session.
